scripts.start:prod: npx prisma db push --skip-generate && cd ../.. && NODE_PATH=apps/api/node_modules node dist/main
scripts.db:export: PGPASSWORD=E198373 pg_dump -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d EG_Antiq --data-only --column-inserts > /tmp/eg_antiq_data.sql && echo 'Data exported to /tmp/eg_antiq_data.sql'
scripts.db:import: docker cp /tmp/eg_antiq_data.sql backend-postgres:/tmp/data.sql && docker exec -e PGPASSWORD=Antiq_dev backend-postgres psql -U postgres -p 5433 -d Antiq_db -f /tmp/data.sql && echo 'Data imported to Docker database'
scripts.db:copy: npm run db:export && npm run db:import
scripts.db:copy:fresh: npm run db:export && docker exec -e PGPASSWORD=Antiq_dev backend-postgres psql -U postgres -p 5433 -d Antiq_db -c "SET session_replication_role = 'replica'; TRUNCATE TABLE refresh_tokens, user_roles, users, description_monuments, gallery, monuments, monuments_era, monuments_type, dynasty, eras, roles CASCADE; SET session_replication_role = 'origin';" && npm run db:import
scripts.db:sync: npm run db:export && docker exec -e PGPASSWORD=Antiq_dev backend-postgres psql -U postgres -p 5433 -d Antiq_db -c 'TRUNCATE users, refresh_tokens, roles, user_roles CASCADE;' && npm run db:import
scripts.db:export:docker: docker exec -e PGPASSWORD=Antiq_dev backend-postgres pg_dump -U postgres -p 5433 -d Antiq_db --data-only --column-inserts > /tmp/antiq_docker_data.sql && echo 'Data exported from Docker to /tmp/antiq_docker_data.sql'
scripts.db:import:local: PGPASSWORD=E198373 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d EG_Antiq -f /tmp/antiq_docker_data.sql && echo 'Data imported to local database'
scripts.db:pull: npm run db:export:docker && npm run db:import:local
scripts.db:pull:fresh: PGPASSWORD=E198373 psql -h localhost -p 5432 -U postgres -d EG_Antiq -c 'TRUNCATE monuments, gallery, monument_descriptions CASCADE;' && npm run db:pull
